name: David Letterman
monologue: Brett Favre is coming out retirement to play for the Minnesota Vikings. Talk about your “cash for clunkers.”

name: David Letterman
monologue: Top Ten Reasons Brett Favre Came Out Of Retirement

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: According to the Congressional Budget Office, the federal deficit hit a record $180 billion in May. Or as it’s known in New York — four Yankee tickets.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Colleges in India have banned all women form wearing jeans. They say it’s to protect them from sexual harassment. Seems like it would be easier to ban sexual harassment.

name: Jimmy Fallon
monologue: Venezuela has banned the sale of Coke Zero due to an unspecified health risk. Still not banned in Venezuela? Actual coke.
